item.title: More rats in the park, 5th September
item.description:
Please can you try and do something about the rats in the park. There were two large rats walking around in The Fernery. Please help. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Avenue, Widmore, London

item.title: Burnt out van on corner of Heavitree and Tuscan Rd, 5th September
item.description:
This van has been completely burnt out at the front, parked up on the corner of Heavitree Rd and Tuscan Rd. Looks like it has been dumped there. Appeared 5/9/25 sometime afternoon.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tuscan Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hammock and shelter in park, 5th September
item.description:
Someone is camping in the park, on and off. Behind The Ice House. Please can the park wardens speak to him and help him find somewhere else to live as he is unnerving people who are walking around the park.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Chase, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 abandoned bins on pavement, 5th September
item.description:
Outside 20 Navarino Road - 2 brown bins full of non-garden rubbish - 1 large green non-standard bin - none of these will be emptied within the usual bin-rounds - please remove them completely, bins and contents
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Navarino Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Three posters need removing, 5th September
item.description:

item.title: Repeated bonfires (not all from the same property) causing noxious air pollution in West Bank and Durley Road, 5th September
item.description:
People in West Bank and/or Durley Road have had 4 or 5 bonfires in the last two or three weeks. This has caused noxious air pollution and forces windows to be closed even in warm weather, or it stinks the house out. They seem to be burning garden waste.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): West Bank, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big steps on the cycleway, 5th September
item.description:
It was "repaired" less than 1year ago, and again the big steps is there endangering the cyclists especially kids. There is at least 4cm between the bridge and the path

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Way Relief Road, Kidbrooke, London
